translations.translation: He has let loose the two seas, converging together,
He has set two seas in motion that flow side by side together,
He unleashed the two seas so that they merge together,
He has made the two oceans meet each other,
He has set flowing two seas that appear to meet.
He has Maraja the two seas meeting together.
He has made the two seas to flow freely (so that) they meet together:
He let forth the two seas that meet together,
He hath loosed the two seas. They meet.
He has set the two oceans in motion, converging together.
He hath let loose the two seas.
He merged the two seas, meeting each other.
He has let free the two bodies of flowing water, meeting together:
He has let loosed the two seas (the salt water and the sweet) meeting together.
He has let forth the two seas, they meet together,
He merged the two seas, converging together.
He released the two seas, meeting [side by side];
[55:19] He has loosed the two waters, the sweet and the salty; [and so] they meet, in the perception of the eye.
He hath loosed the two seas) the sweet and the salty. (They meet) without mixing.

commentaries.author: زيد بن علي
commentaries.text:
وقوله تعالى: { مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ يَلْتَقِيَانِ بَيْنَهُمَا بَرْزَخٌ لاَّ يَبْغِيَانِ } ، { يَخْرُجُ مِنْهُمَا الُّلؤْلُؤُ وَالمَرْجَانُ } معناه المخَلِيُّ: من الماءِ يلتقيان من العذبِ والمالحِ، وبينهما حاجزٌ من الله تعالى، فلا يَختلطان، لا يَبغي الملحُ على العذبِ، ولا العذبُ على الملحِ
 واللؤلُؤ: العظامُ
 والمَرجانُ: الصِّغارُ من اللؤلؤ

translations.translation:
And the saying of Allah, {the two seas meet but are separated by a barrier that they cannot cross} - {from them emerge pearls and coral} - means that the water from the fresh and the salt meet but are separated by a barrier from Allah, so they do not mix, the salt does not yearn for the fresh, and the fresh does not yearn for the salt.


And the pearls: the bones.


And pearls: the small ones among the pearls.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
إذ هو بمقتضى قدرته { مَرَجَ ٱلْبَحْرَيْنِ } أي: أرسل وأطلق بحر الوجود والعدم إلى حيث { يَلْتَقِيَانِ } [الرحمن: 19] أي: يتمازجان ويختلطان
 بحيث لا يتمايزان عند المحجوب الفاقد عن الكشف والشهود؟!

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { مَرَجَ البحرين يلتقيان } أي: أرسل البحر الملح والبحر العذب متجاورين متلاقيين، لا فصل بين الماءين بإسماك أحدهما عن الآخر في مرأى العين
